xml.brief: Retrieve information on a multiple cachesets

req.name: cacheset_uuids
req.p: Pipe-separated list of cacheset UUIDs. These represent the paths you are interested in. No more than 500 UUIDs are allowed. Unlike in the "cacheset" method, this CAN be an empty string (it will result in an empty, but valid, response).

returns.p: A dictionary. Path UUIDs you provide will be mapped to dictionary keys, and each value will be a dictionary of fields you have selected.
Value of null means that no cacheset by this UUID has been found. (This behavior is different than in the services/cachesets/cacheset method, which responds with a HTTP 400 error in such case.)
